channel.title: ABOUT REGULAR MISSION
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "ABOUT REGULAR MISSION"

item.title: Re: ABOUT REGULAR MISSION
item.content:encoded: No, it's not a matter of MUST use genjutsu â€¦ granted, boosting mission stats helps win the mission, but some jutsu have other uses (see EDUT) and there's always the choice not to use a jutsu at all if you don't think you'll need the help in the mission.

item.title: Re: ABOUT REGULAR MISSION
item.content:encoded:
sorry 4 my habit.
so, when i got regular genjutsu mission than i must use genjutsu too. right ?
tq

item.title: Re: ABOUT REGULAR MISSION
item.content:encoded:
1 Turn caps off its hard to read

item.title: ABOUT REGULAR MISSION
item.content:encoded:
WHAT AM I DOING NOW IS :
WHAT EVER THE MISSION IS, THAN I WILL USE SAME JUTSU AS THE MISSION.
EX : GENJUTSU REG MISSION THAN I WILL USED SOME GENJUTSU FOR COMPLETE THAT MISSION.
SAME AS ANOTHER REG MISSION.

IS WHAT I'M DOING IS RIGHT ?? OR I MUST DO SAME AS IN ARENA.
GEN (JUTSU) BEAT TAI (MISSION/JUTSU) BEAT NIN (MISSION/JUTSU) BEAT GEN (MISSION).

TQ
